dotted;}@font-face{font-family:'LubalinGraphStdBookIBM';src:url('//1.www.s81c.com/common/fonts/lubalingraphstd-book-webfont.eot');src:url('//1.www.s81c.com/common/fonts/lubalingraphstd-book-webfont.eot?#iefix') #ibm-cloud-mobile-nav{left:0;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop{display:none;}@media (min-width: 800px){#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop{display:block;}}@media (min-width: 800px){#ibm-cloud-nav .mobile{display:none;}}@media (max-width: 640px){#ibm-cloud-cookie-overlay.open{left:10px !important;margin-left:0px !important;right:10px !important;min-width:255px !important;}}#ibm-cloud-nav{width:100%;background-color:#0489bd;float:none;font-family:Helvetica Neue,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-weight:300;letter-spacing:0.5px;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-links{max-width:960px;margin:0;height:50px;overflow:hidden;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link{display:none;height:50px;line-height:50px;margin:0 10px 0 0;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link>a{height:50px;line-height:50px;position:relative;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box;}@media (min-width: 800px){#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link{display:inline-block;}}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link.cloud-logo-container{display:block;margin:0;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link.cloud-logo-container h1{font-family:Helvetica Neue,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:1.25rem;margin:0;font-weight:normal;font-size:24px;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link.cloud-logo-container h1 a{color:#fff;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link.cloud-logo-container h1 span{font-family:'LubalinDemiIBM';}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link .active{border-bottom:4px solid #83cff1;color:#fff;margin:0 0 0 20px;padding:0 20px 0 0;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link>a:before{content:'';width:0;height:0;position:absolute;top:23px;right:0;border-color:#83cff1 transparent transparent;border-width:5px;border-style:solid;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link a#masthead-link-marketplace,#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link a#masthead-link-partners{padding:0 0 0 20px;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link a#masthead-link-marketplace:before,#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link a#masthead-link-partners:before{display:none;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link a#masthead-link-marketplace:before,#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link a#masthead-link-partners:before{display:none;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link:hover>a:before{top:18px;border-width:5px;border-color:transparent transparent #fff;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link,#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container{height:50px;overflow:hidden;}#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container{background:#0d79a3;float:left;width:60px;margin-right:5px;}#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container:hover{background:#01344f;}#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container:hover .ibm-logo{background-color:#01344f;}@media (min-width: 800px){#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container{padding:0;width:60px;display:block;}}@media (min-width: 640px){#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container .ibm-logo{display:block;position:absolute;width:56px;background:url('//1.www.s81c.com/common/v17e/i/t/ibm-logo.png') no-repeat scroll 0px -99px #0D79A3;height:30px;top:11px;text-indent:-999em;padding:0px;}#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container .ibm-logo:hover{background-position:0px -129px;}}#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container img{width:85%;box-sizing:container-box;}#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-cloud-logo{width:120px;margin-bottom:-4px;}#ibm-cloud-nav ul.desktop-links{padding:0;}#ibm-cloud-nav li{list-style:none;float:left;line-height:30.012px;text-align:left;}#ibm-cloud-nav li a{color:#83cff1;text-decoration:none;display:block;padding:0 20px;position:relative;}#ibm-cloud-nav li:hover{background:#0489bd;}#ibm-cloud-nav li a:hover{color:#fff;}#ibm-cloud-nav li ul{border-left:1px solid #002337;border-right:1px solid #002337;position:absolute;display:none;z-index:99999;padding:20px 0 30px;background-color:#01344f;}#ibm-cloud-nav li ul:before{content:'';width:0;height:0;position:absolute;top:-14px;left:17px;border-style:solid;border-width:8px;border-color:transparent transparent #01344f;}#ibm-cloud-nav li:hover ul{display:block;}#ibm-cloud-nav li li{border-bottom:1px solid #002337;clear:both;float:none;display:block;width:100%;padding:6px 0;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav{position:fixed;top:0;left:-250px;width:250px;height:100%;background:#333;overflow-y:auto;z-index:100;background:#01344f;-webkit-transition:all ease-out 0.4s;-moz-transition:all ease-out 0.4s;transition:all ease-out 0.4s;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-nav-toggle{display:block;margin:20px;padding:0;width:20px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .test-class{display:none;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link:first-child{margin-bottom:20px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link>a{font-size:16px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.local{border-top:1px solid #004a71;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.local ul li a{margin-left:0.5em;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.local a{border-bottom:1px solid #004a71;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.global{background:#012a40;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.global a{border-bottom:1px solid #01344f;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.global ul li a{margin-left:7.2px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link.active{border-bottom:1px solid #004a71;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link.active ul li a{margin-left:14.4px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.active>a{color:#fff;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link.active>a{color:#fff;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link a:hover{background:#0489bd;color:#fff;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.active ul{display:block;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.active .chevron{position:relative;top:-14px;-webkit-transition:all ease-in-out 0.2s;-moz-transition:all ease-in-out 0.2s;transition:all ease-in-out 0.2s;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.active .nested-mobile-link .chevron-wrapper .chevron{top:0;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.active .nested-mobile-link.active .chevron-wrapper .chevron{top:-14px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link ul{display:none;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link a{border:0;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link.active a{border-left:3px solid #83cff1;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link li{display:none;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link ul a{border:0 !important;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link.active li{display:block;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .chevron-wrapper{float:right;width:20px;height:12px;overflow:hidden;margin-top:5px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav ul{margin:0;padding:0;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav li a{display:block;padding:8px 20px;text-decoration:none;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav li a:link,#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav li a:visited,#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav li a:hover,#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav li a:active{text-decoration:none;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav a{color:#83cff1;font-family:Helvetica Neue,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:14.4px;font-weight:300;letter-spacing:0.5px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav img{width:20px;}

dotted;}@font-face{font-family:'LubalinGraphStdBookIBM';src:url('//1.www.s81c.com/common/fonts/lubalingraphstd-book-webfont.eot');src:url('//1.www.s81c.com/common/fonts/lubalingraphstd-book-webfont.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'),url('//1.www.s81c.com/common/fonts/lubalingraphstd-book-webfont.woff') format('woff'),url('//1.www.s81c.com/common/fonts/lubalingraphstd-book-webfont.ttf') format('svg');font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;}@font-face{font-family:'iconsIBM';src:url('//1.www.s81c.com/common/fonts/icons-ibm-v1_2.eot');src:url('//1.www.s81c.com/common/fonts/icons-ibm-v1_2.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'),url('//1.www.s81c.com/common/fonts/icons-ibm-v1_2.woff') format('woff'),url('//1.www.s81c.com/common/fonts/icons-ibm-v1_2.ttf') format('truetype'),url('//1.www.s81c.com/common/fonts/icons-ibm-v1_2.svg#iconsIBM') format('svg');font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;}#ibm-cloud-footer{background:#f8f8f8;font-family:Helvetica Neue,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-weight:300;font-size:14.4px;}#ibm-cloud-footer .container{margin:0 auto;max-width:960px;overflow:hidden;padding:20px 0;}@media (min-width: 640px){#ibm-cloud-footer .container{padding:0;}}#ibm-cloud-footer .ibm-logo{width:80px;margin-bottom:10px;}@media (min-width: 640px){#ibm-cloud-footer .ibm-logo{margin:30px 20px;}}#ibm-cloud-footer ul{margin:0;padding:0;}#ibm-cloud-footer li{list-style:none;text-align:center;}@media (min-width: 640px){#ibm-cloud-footer li{float:left;}}#ibm-cloud-footer li a{text-decoration:none;}#ibm-cloud-footer li a:link,#ibm-cloud-footer li a:visited{text-decoration:none;}#ibm-cloud-footer li a:hover,#ibm-cloud-footer li a:active{text-decoration:underline;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social li .icon-wrapper{display:inline-block;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social li .icon-wrapper:after{content:"";display:table;clear:both;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social li.right{margin-top:20px;}@media (min-width: 640px){#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social li.right{float:right;margin-top:0px;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social li .icon-wrapper{display:block;float:left;}}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .label{color:#333;display:inline-block;line-height:24px;text-decoration:none;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .label.top{display:block;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .label:link,#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .label:visited{text-decoration:none;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .label:hover,#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .label:active{text-decoration:none;}@media (min-width: 640px){#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .label{float:left;margin:20px 20px 20px 0;}}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link{background:url('http://api.markup.ibmcloud.io/images/ibm-cloud-footer-icons.png') repeat scroll 0% 0% transparent;background-position:0px 0px;display:block;margin:10px 20px 10px 0;height:24px;width:24px;float:left;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link.chat{background-position:0 0;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link.email{background-position:-24px 0;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link.tele{background-position:-48px 0;cursor:default;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link.tw{background-position:-72px 0;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link.yt{background-position:-96px 0;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link.wp{background-position:-120px 0;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link.gp{background-position:-144px 0;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link.fb{background-position:-168px 0;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link.li{background-position:-192px 0;}@media (min-width: 640px){#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link{float:left;margin:20px 20px 20px 0;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link.tele{clear:none;}#ibm-cloud-footer ul.social .social-link.chat{margin-left:20px;background-position:0 0;}}#ibm-cloud-footer .footer-link{color:#333;display:block;padding:5px 0;}@media (min-width: 640px){#ibm-cloud-footer .footer-link{padding:40px 20px;}}#ibm-cloud-cookie-overlay.open{position:absolute;z-index:2001800;margin-top:0px;border-radius:5px;padding:10px;background:url('http://consent.truste.com/get?name=trans.png') repeat scroll 0% 0% transparent;left:50%;margin-left:-30%;right:25%;}#ibm-cloud-cookie-overlay.open .cookie-overlay-inner{display:block;}#ibm-cloud-cookie-overlay.open .cookie-overlay-inner iframe{display:block !important;height:900px !important;overflow:hidden !important;position:static !important;width:100% !important;}#ibm-cloud-cookie-overlay .cookie-overlay-inner{display:none;}
